languages.text: "Охохо... сдается мне, участие Лорд-капитана в падении Инцендии Чорда еще припомнят..."
"Ah... I have a feeling that the Lord Captain's involvement in Incendia Chorda's downfall will not soon be forgotten..."

languages.text: “啊……因森蒂娅·库尔达垮了台。我有种预感，库尔达家族的人恐怕不会很快忘记舰长大人在这件事情中扮演的角色……”
languages.original_text: "Ah... I have a feeling that the Lord Captain's involvement in Incendia Chorda's downfall will not soon be forgotten..."

traits.locale_text: “啊……因森蒂娅·库尔达垮了台。我有种预感，库尔达家族的人恐怕不会很快忘记舰长大人在这件事情中扮演的角色……”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Ah... J'ai comme l'impression que l'implication {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} dans la déchéance d'Incendia Chorda n'est pas prête d'être oubliée... »
languages.original_text: "Ah... I have a feeling that the Lord Captain's involvement in Incendia Chorda's downfall will not soon be forgotten..."

traits.locale_text: « Ah... J'ai comme l'impression que l'implication {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} dans la déchéance d'Incendia Chorda n'est pas prête d'être oubliée... »

languages.text: «Ah... Creo que el papel de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán en la caída de Incendia Chorda es algo que tardará en olvidarse...».
languages.original_text: "Ah... I have a feeling that the Lord Captain's involvement in Incendia Chorda's downfall will not soon be forgotten..."

traits.locale_text: «Ah... Creo que el papel de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán en la caída de Incendia Chorda es algo que tardará en olvidarse...».

languages.text: 「ああ…ロード・キャプテンがインセンディア・チョーダの失脚に関与したなんて、忘れられそうにありません…」
languages.original_text: "Ah... I have a feeling that the Lord Captain's involvement in Incendia Chorda's downfall will not soon be forgotten..."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ…ロード・キャプテンがインセンディア・チョーダの失脚に関与したなんて、忘れられそうにありません…」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ah ... Ich habe das Gefühl, dass die Beteiligung des Lord Captains an Incendia Chordas Niedergang nicht so bald in Vergessenheit gerät ..."
languages.original_text: "Ah... I have a feeling that the Lord Captain's involvement in Incendia Chorda's downfall will not soon be forgotten..."

languages.original_text: "Ah... I have a feeling that the Lord Captain's involvement in Incendia Chorda's downfall will not soon be forgotten..."

languages.text: "Of... İçimden bir ses, Lord Kaptan'ın İncendia Chorda'nın çöküşünde oynadığı rolün kısa sürede unutulmayacağını söylüyor."
languages.original_text: "Ah... I have a feeling that the Lord Captain's involvement in Incendia Chorda's downfall will not soon be forgotten..."

traits.locale_text: "Of... İçimden bir ses, Lord Kaptan ve İncendia Chorda'nın çöküşü arasındaki ilginin yakın zamanda unutulmayacağını söylüyor."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
